resources.string: Video Communication through Opportunistic Relays and Scalable Video Coding

Vectors is a research project at BITS Pilani Hyderabad Campus for studying the effectiveness of using Delay Tolerant Networks for sending user-generated Video. This project uses the Scalable Video Codec (SVC) for encoding video data. \n\nAndroid phones are used as nodes for relaying the data. The app is optimises the sending of data over Bluetooth to minimise power consumption and storage space used.
